name: Mojito Energy Balls. Vegan Glutenfree Raw Recipe
description: The best Mojito energy balls. With or without alcohol. How to make non-alcoholic Vegan Mojito Balls. Snack bites with Dates, lime zest, mint, nuts and seeds. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup certified gf oats (or use quinoa flakes or coconut flakes to omit Oats)
9  Medjool dates (3/4 cup , add more for sweeter)
1/4 cup packed mint leaves (use mint extract for longer shelf life)
1 to 2 Tbsp rum or tequila (or Orange juice or a combination of these)

recipeInstructions.text: Add almonds, walnuts, oats, flax seeds to a food processor and pulse to a coarse meal.
recipeInstructions.name: Add almonds, walnuts, oats, flax seeds to a food processor and pulse to a coarse meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Add coconut, chia, sesame, salt, mint leaves and dates and pulse till the dates are well incorporated. The mixture will be crumbly.
recipeInstructions.name: Add coconut, chia, sesame, salt, mint leaves and dates and pulse till the dates are well incorporated. The mixture will be crumbly.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the lemon juice, zest and 2 Tbsp of orange juice or liquor and pulse to combine. The mixture should now be doughy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the lemon juice, zest and 2 Tbsp of orange juice or liquor and pulse to combine. The mixture should now be doughy.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a bowl. If too wet, add oat flour and mix in. If too dry, add more juice or maple syrup. Taste and adjust sweet if needed by adding sugar or maple syrup.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to a bowl. If too wet, add oat flour and mix in. If too dry, add more juice or maple syrup. Taste and adjust sweet if needed by adding sugar or maple syrup.

recipeInstructions.text: Shape into balls or bars. Store refrigerated for upto a week, frozen for months. Use mint extract for storing the refrigerator for longer.
recipeInstructions.name: Shape into balls or bars. Store refrigerated for upto a week, frozen for months. Use mint extract for storing the refrigerator for longer.

recipeInstructions.text: Variations: Add a scoop of protein powder to amp up the protein. Roll into coconut flakes or sesame seeds for variation.
recipeInstructions.name: Variations: Add a scoop of protein powder to amp up the protein. Roll into coconut flakes or sesame seeds for variation.
